data.title: 2019 National Football Signing Day
data.meta_description: GREENVILLE, N.C. - First-year ECU Head Football Coach Mike Houston announced the addition of defensive linemen Rick D’Abreu and Immanuel Hickman, along with tight
data.text:
GREENVILLE, N.C. - First-year ECU Head Football Coach Mike Houston announced the addition of defensive linemen Rick D’Abreu and Immanuel Hickman, along with tight end Zech Byrd to his 2019 signing day class after the trio formally submitted their national letters-of-intent Wednesday.

To use the interactive map below, when a state is highlighted in purple, that indicates an ECU signee's home state. Simply run your cursor over the state and you will see the number of future Pirates from that state.

Date Signee Pos. Ht./ Wt. Class Hometown Previous School Highlights Dec. 19, 2018 Alex Angus* DB 6-2/ 190 Fr. Browns Summit, N.C. Page HS Highlights Feb. 6, 2019 Zech Byrd TE 6-7/ 265 So. Millbrook, Ala. Garden City CC Highlights Feb. 6, 2019 Rick D’Abreu DL 6-2/ 240 Fr. Chester, Va. Thomas Dale HS Highlights Dec. 19, 2018 Keziah Everett DT 6-1/ 325 Fr. Farmville, N.C. East Rutherford HS Highlights Dec. 19, 2018 Ja’Quan McMillian* DB 5-9/ 165 Fr. Winston-Salem, N.C. West Forsyth HS Highlights Dec. 19, 2018 Patrick Nations* PK 6-0/ 190 Fr. Tamassee, S.C.
